resources.string: To protect browsers from dangerous sites, advertising and to improve user privacy online click \'Activate\' and confirm the creation of a secure VPN-connection.
VPN service is unavailable on this version of Android (or firmware)!\nMake a complaint to your device manufacturer.
Do not fetch widgets, comments and buttons on other web-pages
Let them know all web-pages you are openning
Change browser UA randomly. Hardens spying on user.
Change mobile browser UA to desktop. Allow to view full version of sites.
Block all data from third-party sites
Pressing the button \'I agree\', you agree to our terms of use and privacy policy.
Your message has been successfully sent to the developer of WebGuard.
Your message can not be sent.\nPlease, check your internet connection and try again.
You didn\'t give your email address. We won\'t be able to contact you to resolve the issue.
Connection to malware site %s has been blocked
Connection to fishing site %s has been blocked
Working with site %s can be extra-chargeable. It is recommended to read site policy.
Hello!\nIn my opinion domain %s is being blocked by WebGuard by mistake.
WebGuard is made to effectively block advertisement on web sites in every web browser.
It blocks tracking systems and counters, which aim to get your history of browsing to sell it to third-party companies, sometimes in violation of privacy, security and sometimes even ethics.
Many users don\'t know, that their history is gathered by all social networks also by their widgets and buttons embedded on other sites.
Besides blocking advertising and tracking systems, it blocks compulsive attempts of sites and advertising systems to deliver malicious applications to the user device.

Effectively blocking access to websites that distribute malicious applications, trojans that can jeopardize your privacy, spend significant funds from the user\'s account, or take full control over the device.
This application works by creating a VPN-like network tunnel. Only in this case the data is not going through our servers, but via a filter embedded in the application.
For the application to function properly it should be running all the time, it is shown by the system icon in notification area.
When the network connection is disabled the VPN service itself goes off, freeing up resources, in this case, the icon will be hidden until the next internet connection.

Data compression drastically reduces page load time and minimizes traffic consumption.\nThis option is very useful for those who does not use expensive prepaid traffic plans but wants to save money.\nIt is recommended to disable traffic options and compression in browsers while using our feature.

The anonymity option allows you to hide your real IP address, which is used by any website to track your location, and many web-tracking systems can collect the "user profile" and connect it to you.\nIn the countries with totalitarian regime and total censorship it allows viewing blocked sites and leave anonymized comments.

In the case of using compression without anonymity connection with the sites will also be carried out through our servers, but the site will be sent a special header that explains what IP-address the user came from.\nFurther reaction to this header depends on the implementation of the specific site.
Cannot establish VPN\nUser must give permission.
Your firmware doesn\'t support establishing VPN connections or the VPN interface is in wrong state, try to reboot your device.

Oops! We got a bug problem (see Android issue #1900). Click \'Continue\', in the next window, click \'Disconnect\' and re-enable WebGuard. If the window doesn\'t appear, you need to reboot device and start WebGuard.
Unfortunately, your device have installed or updated WebGuard with errors. Some libraries are unavailable.\nPlease, uninstall WebGuard and reinstall it again.
Be prepared - in this mode some sites can work not as expected.

WebGuard has detected that there is a proxy set by ###, which is interferring with it. We tried to disable it, but unfortunately it sets itself back.\nIn order to use WebGuard properly you should disable that application.

WebGuard has detected that there is a proxy set by unidentified application, which is interferring with it. We tried to disable it, but unfortunately it sets itself back.\nIn order to use WebGuard properly you should disable the application with proxy.
WebGuard has detected that you or the system have not granted it some needed permissions. Therefore, it can not work as expected.\nYou should reinstall this app for it to work properly.
Hide your true location in apps
There are no reachable proxy-servers right now.\nWe will try to connect to them automatically, but in the meantime the compression and anonymity are disabled.
No reachable servers in selected country.

There is no connectivity to proxy servers in chosen country.\nYou can choose another, or go on using the internet without traffic compression and anonymization while the connection is not established again.
Subscription options to access all the functionality of this application:
Unfortunately, the types of subscription to access all the functionality of this application couldn\'t be loaded. Please, check your Internet connection and Play Market is working, then try again.
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t connect to Google Play.\nIf there is no Google Play on your device the subscription to access the functionality of this application is not possible.
Please confirm you\'re not a robot to get a free subscription for XXX days.
Subscription can\'t be loaded. Please, check your Internet connection and try again.
Captcha can\'t be loaded or validated. Please, check your Internet connection and try again.
You have entered an invalid Captcha Code. Please try again.
Unfortunately, you can\'t get a free subscription any more.
Enter promo code if you have one.
Promo code cannot be verified. Please, check your Internet connection and try again.
You have entered an invalid or expired promo code. Check promo code and try again.
We noticed, you are not using WebGuard for long time. If you decide to enable security - close this dialog and use the switch at the top right corner of the application.
Do you want to disable protection of your device?
Your subscription has been successfully activated.
There was an error with purchase verification.
There was an error with purchase validation. We will try to validate it again soon.
Your subscription was successfully processed but not activated. Please, try \"Check subscription\" option to activate subscription and send us message if you still have problems.

It's a pity that you don't use the extended features of WebGuard.
You can use such features as:

- Enhanced advertisement blocking
- On the fly data compression and encryption
- Anonymized surfing from other countries and more...
Collect additional debug information for developers (~5MB memory usage)

If you have problems with checking the checkbox, then you have one of the \"overlay\" apps running and obscuring the display.\nIn that case, to successfully enable any app that is using VPN you can disable that app and try again.
A new version of WebGuard is available. You should update it as soon as possible.
An important update is available. You can not continue to use this copy of WebGuard and need to update.
WebGuard developer has been changed and new application is available. This version is not supported anymore. All active subscription will be active in new application. Install a new app!

WebGuard developer has been changed and new application is available. This version is not supported anymore. All active subscription will be active in new application. You can not continue to use this copy of WebGuard. Install a new app!

Your subscription has expired. To use all the functionality again you must prolongate the subscription.

Results of WebGuard work:

Your free subscription has expired. To use all the functionality again you must buy the subscription.

Results of WebGuard work:
Google Play is not responding or not installed. Please, check Play Market is working and then try again.
If you have subscription issues use this button
You are not connected to network.\nPlease, connect to Internet and try again.
Your subscription is verified successfully.\nYou have no restrictions in WebGuard.
Your subscription can not be verified.\nDid you get it?
Your subscription is expired and can not be activated.
Background network activity is disabled.\nIn this mode it is impossible for WebGuard to operate properly.\nYou must disable background data restrictions to use this App.
Only browsers have Internet - saving battery and data
You will need to get a subscription before you can start using WebGuard.

Thank you for using WebGuard! Please evaluate it. We really appreciate your support.

Results of WebGuard work:

Thank you for choosing WebGuard! Please evaluate it. We really appreciate your support.

Results of WebGuard work:
Dear user, help us improve our application by sending us comments about your experience.
Dear user, help us improve our application by sending us comments about your experience.
Warning! These options are for advanced users only.
Warning! When this option enabled, Internet access will be blocked in all applications except browsers.

ads removed: XXX
threats blocked: YYY
traffic saved: ZZZ
WebGuard work results from the moment of installation:\n

Dear users, we activate to your all functions of application:
- maximum ads blocking
- great traffic compression
- anonymity and privacy protection
- improved protection from dangerous sites and malware
- firewall

The trial period works 7 days. Hurry to try!

Dear users, the WebGuard team stops support of the free application version since August 2015.\nTo our most devoted users we suggest to buy lifetime subscription with discount 67% at the price about $5,99 (the usual price of $17,99).
